韔字的基本解释

韔
chàng
弓袋：“虎韔镂膺。”
把弓装弓袋：“之子于狩，言韔其弓。”

韔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chàng］
［《廣韻》丑亮切，去漾，徹。］
(1)弓袋。
(2)指装弓于袋。

韔字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韔； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1394第21
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?丑亮切，音暢。【說文】弓衣也。从韋長聲。【詩·秦風】虎韔鏤膺，交韔二弓。【傳】韔，弓室也。交韔，交二弓于韔也。又【小雅】言韔其弓。【禮·檀弓·韔弓註】韔，韜也。　又【集韻】持亮切，音仗。義同。【詩·小雅】言韔其弓。【釋文】韔，又治亮反。　又【集韻】力讓切，音亮。【詩·小雅】言韔其弓。【釋文】沈重讀。【集韻】或作䩨。

韔字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
韔字的起名意思

暂无。

Kun
Basic explanation of words
Kun
chàng
Bow bag: "The tiger is pierced."
Put the bow in the bow bag: "The son of Yu Shou, speaks about his bow."
Kun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chàng］
["Guangyun" is ugly and brightly cut, go to the water, and thoroughly. ]
(1) Bow bag.
(2) It means to put the bow in the bag.
Kun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Wei Zi Department】　韔; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1394 21
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ugly bright cut, smooth sound. [Said the text] Gong Yi also. Cong Wei Changsheng. 【Poetry·Qin Feng】The tiger is engraved and made two bows. [Biography] Kun, the bow room is also. Jiao Kun, Jia Er Gong Yu Kun also. And [Xiaoya] Yan Kun his bow. 【Li·Tan Gong·Kun Bow Note】Kun, Tao Ye.　 [Ji Yun] keeps bright and cut, and the sound is played. The same meaning. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Yan Kun its bow. 【Explanation】Kun, and then the antidote.　[Jiyun] Forced to cut, the sound is bright. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Yan Kun its bow. 【Explanation】Heavy reading. [Ji Yun] Or as a sorrow.
Kun
